s3770: Six, attacked Song and Chen, because they doubled our submission to Jin.
s3771: Three, Chu and Zheng attacked us, because we doubled Chu.
s3776: Twenty, with Chu invaded Chen, then invaded Song. Jin sent Zhao Dun to attack us, because we doubled Jin.
s3783: Two, crown prince Cheng Fu defeated the Tall Di.
s3784: Fourteen, Zhao Chuan assassinated Duke Ling, Zhao Dun made Chuan welcome Gong Zi Hei Lie from Zhou, established him. Zhao clan granted noble status.
s3787: Four, Hua Yuan trapped in Zheng because of the sheep stew.
s3792: Twenty-one, fought with Song army, captured Hua Yuan.
s3800: First year of Duke Cheng of Jin (Hei Lie), attacked Zheng.
s3802: Eight, attacked Lu Hun, reached Luo, inquired about the tripods' weight.
s3803: Five, ransomed Hua Yuan, he fled and returned. Besieged Cao.
s3808: Twenty-two, Hua Yuan fled and returned.
s3818: Nine, Ruo Ao clan caused disorder, extinguished them. Attacked Zheng.
s3824: First year of Duke Ling of Zheng (Yi), Gong Zi Gui Sheng assassinated Duke Ling because of the turtle.
s3832: Three, Zhong Xing Huan Zi Xun Lin Fu rescued Zheng, attacked Chen.
s3837: Ten, Chu attacked Zheng, made peace with us. Jin Zhong Xing Huan Zi resisted Chu, rescued Zheng, attacked us.
s3840: First year of Duke Xiang of Zheng (Jian), Duke Ling's younger brother. Chu attacked us, Jin came to rescue.
s3849: First year of Duke Huan of Qin
s3853: Eleven, Jin and Wei invaded us.
s3880: Six, with Lu attacked Qin, captured Qin spy, executed him in Jiang market, revived after six days.
s3881: Three, Jin attacked us, captured spy.
s3882: Thirteen, attacked Chen, extinguished Shu and Liao.
s3889: First year of Duke Xuan of Yan
s3896: Seven, sent Huan Zi to attack Chu. Led feudal lords' army to attack Chen and rescue Zheng. Duke Cheng died.
s3898: Fourteen, attacked Zheng, Jin Xi Que rescued Zheng, defeated us.
s3904: Five, Chu attacked us, Jin came to rescue, defeated Chu army.
s3911: Ten, duke died. Cui Zhu was favored, Gao and Guo drove him out, he fled to Wei.
s3912: First year of Duke Jing of Jin (Ju), attacked Zheng with Song.
s3916: First year of Duke Mu of Wei (Chi), Qi's Cui Zhu came fleeing.
s3917: Fifteen, Xia Zheng Shu killed Duke Ling because of his mother.
s3920: Six, Jin, Song, Chu attacked us.
s3927: First year of Duke Qing of Qi (Wu Ye)
s3930: Sixteen, led feudal lords to execute Chen's Xia Zheng Shu, established Chen Duke Ling's son Wu.
s3933: First year of Duke Cheng of Chen (Wu), Duke Ling's crown prince.
s3944: Three, rescued Zheng, defeated by Chu at the river.
s3946: Seventeen, besieged Zheng, Zheng lord bared flesh to apologize, released him.
s3952: Eight, Chu besieged us, we used humble words to resolve it.
s3978: Nineteen, besieged Song, because they killed our envoy.
s3979: Sixteen, killed Chu envoy, Chu besieged us.
